        Parameters:
        parentValues -
        Returns:
        ContentValues Returns updated ContentValues Object.

      • deserializeFromCursor

        protected abstract Object deserializeFromCursor(Cursor cursor)
        Deserialize one record. Deserialization is the process of turning a stream of bytes or a cursor into an object in memory. Template Method - This methods will be implemented by its subclass.
        Parameters:
        cursor -
        Returns:
        Object Returns Bean Object from Cursor.

      • deserializeFromCursorToStringArray

        protected abstract String[] deserializeFromCursorToStringArray(Cursor cursor)
        Deserialize one record. Deserialize method overload to return Cursor data as StringArray. Deserialization is the process of turning a stream of bytes or a cursor into an object in memory. Template Method - This methods will be implemented by its subclass.
        Parameters:
        cursor -
        Returns:
        String[] Returns Bean Object from Cursor as StringArray.

      • deserialize

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
        cursor -
        Returns:
        Object Returns Bean Object from Cursor.

      • isInsertOperation

        protected boolean isInsertOperation()
        Check if the save operation is to insert or update data. Initially a manager do not have a valid ID, so this property is checked ("0" equals insert).
        Returns:
        boolean Returns TRUE representing a insert operation, otherwise is a update operation.
